Text: MrUnpopular, I too am also giving up sharing movies on TPB and other sites. I read ISPs are starting to monitor torrents being uploaded, so I am not going to take a chance. I plan to stop uploading and sharing Hallmark and Lifetime and disney movies. It's been a pleasure.

If you use a VPN or seedbox they can't do much since it's not directly through your ISP, but yeah it's risky, especially the more frequently the person uploads.

Maybe one day "piracy" will be legalised...
